author: Pamela Muse
text:
The Alliance is gathering replies to the following question:

Which departments, divisions and/or work groups are labor intensive as to critical information for day-to-day processes that is collected on paper/forms?  For example Police Accident Reports; building permits, business license, etc
How do you transfer data from paper to your systems/programs to make it usable? 
Do you use data entry staff to transfer paper/forms to your systems/programs?  
If so, how many?

Thank you!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org
title: Paper Processes for Forms
